definition: (bird species of China) Chinese pond heron (Ardeola bacchus)
pond/reservoir/moat
surname Chi
heron
(bird species of China) Javan pond heron (Ardeola speciosa)

sentences.english: The growth of nestlings of in little egret and pond heron appeared in S curve.
sentences.chinese: 白鹭和池鹭雏鸟的生长表现为S型生长曲线。

sentences.english: The Chinese Pond Heron is a crapulous predator.
sentences.chinese: 中国池鹭是个殄殄猎食者。

sentences.english: On the ooze at the water's edge stand the saintly-looking paddy birds in meditation.
sentences.chinese: 圣洁的池鹭站在水边的淤泥中若有所思。

sentences.english: The results showed that the population density and biomass of Ardeola bacchus were higher.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，池鹭的种群密度和生物量最高。
